location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], and his assistants, William Bowyear and John Sebastian Natter, to Charles Crommelin, President and Governor at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter confirms the arrival of the English fleet and gives the latest information on the Chaub [Banu Ka‘b], Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna], and Carem Caun [Karim Khan]. Also mentioned is Jervis' departure for Bombay to join the Council there.
